sourcesContent: import React from "react"; // import { Dialog } from "@material-ui/core"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CCard, CCardBody, CCol, CForm, CFormGroup, CFormText, CTextarea, CInput, CLabel, CRow, } from "@coreui/react"; import { getUsersById } from "src/api/apiUser"; const UsersTable = ({item}) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = (id) =>{ alert(id) //getUsersById(id) setShow(true); } return ( <> Fill supplier Details {/* Form Start */} Supplier Name Supplier Address Supplier Phone {/* Form End */} {item.userName} {item.email} {item.lastName} {item.phoneNo} {item.address} Manager ); } export default UsersTable
